Pay attention to the specifics of an achievement - some only count toward the unlock if a drop comes from an activity directly.

Cooking chest
Type: Container

This large cast iron pot suddenly appeared between the pots and kettles while you were more focused on not burning your dish.

Cooking chest is an openable treasury item. It can drop while doing Cooking activities, and can be obtained from some other sources. These Chests are the only way to obtain some Cooking based Equipment. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
